entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Flurries near the Swan Hills this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 06:13 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Flurries near the Swan Hills this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 06:13 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023
